item.title: Customer zip code validation
item.description: As a support engineer entering customer information, I want zip code validation, so that I can be instantly informed about a bad zip code.
item.acceptancecriteria:
Acceptance criteria


  • Must support Zip+4 (with or without a dash}
  • Validation warning message must be in red

Manual test steps


  1. Navigate to Fabrikam Fiber home page
  2. Click Customers {Customer list displays}
  3. Click Edit next to customer Dan Bacon {Edit screen displays}
  4. Change the customer's zip code to "98052ABC"
  5. Click Save {Validation warning displays}

item.title: Employee service areas
item.description: As a support manager, I want to track which areas each employees cover, so that I can assign support tickets based on geography.
item.acceptancecriteria:
Acceptance criteria


  • Allow comma-separated string of areas
  • Displayed on Employees list page

Manual test steps


  1. Navigate to Fabrikam Fiber home page
  2. Click Employees {Employee list displays}
  3. Click Edit next to employee Drew Robbins {Edit screen displays}
  4. Change Service Areas to "98052, 98053, 98073"
  5. Click Save {Service areas are displayed}
  6. Click Edit next to employee Drew Robbins {Edit screen displays}
  7. Clear the Service Areas field
  8. Click Save {Service areas have been removed}

item.title: Level 3 escalation
item.description: As a support engineer, I want to be able to escalate a ticket to level 3, so that it reflects the highest level of importance to the organization.
item.acceptancecriteria:
Acceptance criteria


  • Selected in the same way as other escalation levels
  • Displayed on Dashboard page
  • Displayed on Service Tickets page

Manual test steps


  1. Navigate to Fabrikam Fiber home page
  2. Click ticket number A014103 {Service ticket screen displays}
  3. Click Edit {Edit screen displays}
  4. Select Escalation Level of "Level 3"
  5. Click Save
  6. Click Dashboard {Ticket shows Level 3 escalation}
  7. Click ticket number A014103 {Service ticket screen displays}
  8. Click Edit {Edit screen displays}
  9. Reset Escalation Level to "Level 1"
  10. Click Save
  11. Click Dashboard {Ticket shows original escalation level}

item.title: Add new employee
item.description: As a support manager, I want to be able to add new emloyees myself, so that we can start planning and tracking their work immediately.
item.acceptancecriteria:
Acceptance criteria


  • Feature should be available from the employee list page
  • Prompt for name, address, and service areas

Manual test steps


  1. Navigate to Fabrikam Fiber home page
  2. Click Employees {Employee list displays}
  3. Click Create New button {New employee screen displays}
  4. Enter First Name of "Elwood"
  5. Enter Last Name of "McGee"
  6. Enter Address of "1 Microsoft Way"
  7. Enter City of "Redmond"
  8. Enter State of "WA"
  9. Enter Zip of "98052"
  10. Click Create {New employee is listed}
  11. Click Delete next to employee Elwood McGee {Confirmation screen displays}
  12. Click Delete {New employee is no longer listed}
